name: VIP Scratch Cards
description:
Enjoy the excitement of realistic scratch cards — for free. VIP Scratch Cards welcomes you to scratch thrilling new cards based on some of the world's most popular scratchies. VIP Scratch Cards is one of the hottest new casino games.

Level up and unlock new scratch cards progressively as you play. Scratch off bonus panels to win bonus money.

Win massive jackpots in a range of scratch off designs including:

- Booty Cove: Bask in the calming waters of Booty Cove. A good chance to win big! Win up to 10,000 coins
- Luxury Club: 13 chances to win up to 100,000 coins
- Hearts: two different fun game modes with your chance to win 100,000
- Candy Cash: multiply your winnings up to 10 times
- Over the Moon: win up to 250,000 coins

Plus fun seasonal games such as Merry Money and Spooky Cash. More designs every new season!

VIP Scratch Cards is a simulated gambling app. You are not betting real money and cannot win real money while playing this game.
